name: Symbiosis (itch) (Winnitude!)
description:
GMTK 2021 SUBMISSION
All 3D models and sounds are assets, all code besides 3 UI elements mine.

Fight against medieval soldiers trained with deadly weapons in hardcore, skill-based melee combat. Dodge, parry and counter-attack your way to victory!

Controls

  • Q - Health Potion
  • E - Mana Potion
  • LMB - Throw dagger/cast spell
  • RMB - Attack (Drag RMB as you attack and you will slice in the direction you drag your mouse)
  • Middle mouse button - Block
  • Space - Jump
  • WASD - Move
  • F - Pick up
  • Esc - pause
  • 1, 2, 3, 4 - Equip throwing knife, shadow knife (high dmg), electric knife (knockback), or teleport spell
